works.description: In the digital age, what many of us think about a romantic note is either a cute text message on your smartphone or an email expressing your feelings. In order to keep romance alive in the digital age, a team of artists and engineers has created the digital Lovers’ Boxes that promise to put the spark back into relationships. Designed as traditional wooden jewelry boxes, the Lovers’ Boxes integrate the latest technology that helps couples record loving messages for each other.
